alert.note: Alert for Hendricks; Putnam (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 1:27AM EDT until July 26 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Hendricks County in central Indiana... Central Putnam County in west central Indiana... * Until 200 AM EDT. * At 127 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Greencastle, or 27 miles south of Crawfordsville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Greencastle around 135 AM EDT. Fillmore around 145 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Groveland, Coatesville and Stilesville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
